name: .50 Action Express FMJ
description: A brass-jacketed variant of the .50 Action express round.  This increases penetration slightly at the cost of reduced damage from expansion.

name: .50 Action express
description: .50 Action express ammunition with 300gr JHP bullets. The .50 Action express round is one of the most powerful handgun cartridges available. The principal uses of the .50 AE are metallic silhouette shooting and medium/big game hunting. Like the .44 Magnum, .454 Casull, .460 S&W Magnum, and .500 S&W Magnum, it is also well suited for defense against large predators, such as bears.

name: blackpowder .50 Action Express
description: This .50 AE cartridge is loaded with 45gr of blackpowder and a 250gr cast lead semi-wadcutter.
